english: Sanitation Standard for Foods to be Eaten Raw
title: 生食用食品類衛生標準（96.12.21訂定）

articles.content: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.
Foods to be eaten raw means such foods to be served after preparing treatments like washing and peeling.
Products shall have their original pleasant flavor or color. No putridity, discoloration, off odor and flavor, contamination, moulds, foreign matter or parasite shall be found.
